strIntroduction: Depart by Coach and Return trip by River Sun Cruise About 70 km north of Bangkok, Ayuthaya was the second ancient capital of Siam. Take an air-conditioned coach to explore the Bangpa-In Summer Palace and the magnificent temples in Ayutthaya.
